On Mon, 2004-11-15 at 09:35, bja@... wrote:
> You have to build an index-file first (.cdx)
> this is the file you launch with the proxy-viewer
> 
> For building index-files you can use dk.netarkivet.ArcUtils.ExtractCDX
> - which you can download at www.netarchive.dk too. This too works only
> with non-gzipped arc-files - but it looks like you have such in your
> test-crawl so it should be easy.
> 
> Feel free to ask any questions - it should work - at least we got it
> working with good results

Remember that you have to sort the CDX file -- ExtractCDX doesn't do
that as the file can easily become too big to have in memory, but e.g.
Unix sort() scales much better.

-Lars
